data.description:
Explore worlds created by tons of other players and create your own! Collaborate with your friends and build unique experiences for others to enjoy, all without writing a single line of code!

For more information go to www.voxelus.com

changelog.change_log: Improvements and bugfixes.
Improvements and bugfixes.
Introducing Voxelus Experiences!
Undo and Redo feature added to Building Mode.
Various improvements and bugfixes.
Various improvements and bugfixes.

Version 0.1

-Overall improvements in performance and UI.
-Added Create mode which allows for full world building and uploading.
-Overall improvements in performance and UI. -Added Create mode which allows for full world building and uploading.

Version 0.90
Added build mode in game.
Now gamepad is required.

Version 0.83
Added blob shadows to player models.
Worlds now display Plays and Likes.

Version 0.81
Improved error handling.
If you already have an account you may need to reset your password in order to regain access.  (www.voxelus.com/lostpassword)

Version 0.81
Fixed issues with multiplayer connectivity.
Fixed issues with the sign up process.
If you already have an account you may need to reset your password in order to regain access.  (www.voxelus.com/lostpassword)

Version 0.81
Fixed issues with multiplayer connectivity.
Fixed issues with the sign up process.
If you already have an account you may need to reset your password in order to regain access.  (www.voxelus.com/lostpassword)

Version 16.0

New Backend system.
Improved overall stability.



If you already have an account you may need to reset your password in order to regain access.  (www.voxelus.com/lostpassword)

Version 15.9

User creation flow fix.

Version 15.8

Pause menu fix.

Version 15.7

Multiplayer sessions update fix

Version 15.6

In game communication quick action wheel added.
UI improvements.

Version 15.4

New navigation menu.
Performance improvement.

Version 15
Updated Skybox.
Issue loading in game objects fixed.
User account creation in app.
